textOne.title: Effortless Organization
textOne.text: Categorize your contacts easily, so you can quickly find the right person when you need them.

textTwo.title: Smart Search
textTwo.text: Our powerful search feature ensures speedy access to contact details, saving you time and effort.

textThree.title: Seamless Access
textThree.text: Enjoy access across all your devices, ensuring your contacts are with you wherever you go.

modalConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete the contact:
